name: Cozy Single Room
description: Indulge in the comfort of our Cozy Single Room. This intimate space features a comfortable bed, perfect for a solo traveler seeking relaxation. Enjoy modern amenities and a welcoming ambiance during your stay. Ideal for short stays or solo getaways.
special_offers: 10% off for bookings of 3 nights or more

name: Spacious Double Room
description: Escape to our Spacious Double Room, designed for comfort and convenience. Featuring a queen-sized bed and a private balcony, it offers a tranquil retreat for couples or solo travelers seeking extra space. Unwind and enjoy the modern comforts of home away from home.

name: Luxurious Suite
description: Experience luxury in our Luxurious Suite, where elegance meets comfort. With separate living and sleeping areas, it's perfect for a romantic getaway or a special occasion. Indulge in refined amenities and personalized service, ensuring a memorable stay.

name: Charming Twin Room
description: Discover the charm of our Charming Twin Room, offering a cozy retreat with garden views. With two comfortable beds, it's ideal for friends or family traveling together. Enjoy complimentary breakfast and modern amenities for a delightful stay.

name: Family-Friendly Apartment
description: Treat your family to a memorable stay in our Family-Friendly Apartment. With multiple bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a spacious living room, it offers ample space for relaxation and bonding. Kids stay for free, making it perfect for family vacations.

name: Elegant Executive Room
description: Experience luxury in our Elegant Executive Room, designed for discerning travelers. With a king-sized bed, workspace, and modern amenities, it offers a perfect blend of comfort and functionality. Ideal for business travelers or those seeking a touch of luxury.

name: Rustic Cabin
description: Immerse yourself in nature in our Rustic Cabin, nestled in the woods. Perfect for nature lovers and adventurers, it offers a cozy retreat with modern comforts. Enjoy the tranquility of the surroundings and take advantage of special offers for last-minute bookings.

name: Modern Loft
description: Experience urban living in our Modern Loft, offering panoramic city views and contemporary design. With an open floor plan, it's perfect for travelers seeking style and sophistication. Enjoy a luxurious stay with modern amenities and personalized service.

name: Historic Guesthouse
description: Step back in time in our Historic Guesthouse, filled with charm and character. Featuring antique furnishings and a serene garden, it offers a unique stay experience. Ideal for history enthusiasts or those seeking a tranquil escape from the modern world.

special_offer: 10% off for bookings of 3 nights or more

name: Deluxe Double Room
description: Experience luxury in our Deluxe Double Room, featuring elegant decor and spacious accommodation for a comfortable stay.

name: Executive Suite
description: Indulge in luxury in our Executive Suite, featuring a separate living area, stunning views, and personalized service.

name: Family Room
description: Enjoy a comfortable stay with your family in our spacious Family Room, equipped with modern amenities and cozy furnishings.

name: Luxury Penthouse
description: Experience ultimate luxury in our Luxury Penthouse, featuring panoramic views, private terrace, and personalized services.

name: Standard Room
description: Relax and unwind in our comfortable Standard Room, perfect for business or leisure travelers.

name: Economy Room
description: Enjoy a budget-friendly stay in our Economy Room, offering essential amenities for a comfortable accommodation.

name: Luxury Villa
description: Experience luxury living in our private Luxury Villa, featuring spacious interiors, private pool, and stunning views.
